mapper.select: SELECT WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , TO_NUMBER(SORT_DV_VAL) AS SORT_DV_VAL /* 정렬구분값 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE APY_YM = #{baseYm} AND WARE_DV_CD = '2' /* 서비스센터 */ AND WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20' /* 조직창고 */ AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_NM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY WARE_USE_YN DESC, SORT_DV_VAL, WARE_NO

SELECT MLNG_CNTN AS GUBUN , SUBSTR(MLNG_ID, 9) AS GUBUN_CD , CASE WHEN MLNG_ID = 'MSG_TXT_KIT' THEN 1 WHEN MLNG_ID = 'MSG_TXT_WTHOL_VLV' THEN 2 WHEN MLNG_ID = 'MSG_TXT_WATER_COND_MAT' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END AS SORT_ORDER FROM T_CMZ_MLNG_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_BASE' AND LNG_ID = #{session.langId} AND MLNG_ID IN ('MSG_TXT_KIT', 'MSG_TXT_WTHOL_VLV', 'MSG_TXT_WATER_COND_MAT', 'MSG_TXT_SBSUM') /* 키트류, 조리수밸브, 연수기자재, 소계 */ ORDER BY SORT_ORDER
